Quote: I told you, I don't want to join your super-secret boy band.
Reference: Tony Stark to Nick Fury when asked to join the Avengers in Iron Man 2

Quote: Nothing goes over my head. My reflexes are too fast. I would catch it.
Reference: Drax in Guardians of the Galaxy

Quote: Doth mother know you weareth her drapes?
Reference: Tony Stark, upon meeting Thor in The Avengers

Quote: I'm made of rocks, as you can see, but don't let that intimidate you. You don't need to be afraid unless you're made of scissors! Just a little rock-paper-scissors joke for you!
Reference: Korg in Thor: Ragnarok

Quote: Don't scare me like that, colonizer.
Reference: Shuri to Everett Ross in Black Panther

Quote: Just Wong? Like Adele? Or Aristotle? Drake. Bono. Eminem.
Reference: Stephen Strange when introduced to Wong in Doctor Strange

Quote: This is a man. … It's like a pirate had a baby with an angel.
Reference: Drax describing Thor in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Honestly, until this exact second, I thought you were a Build-a-Bear.
Reference: Tony Stark to Rocket Raccoon in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: What master do I serve? What am I supposed to say? Jesus?
Reference: Peter Quill in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Dude, you're embarrassing me in front of the wizards.
Reference: Tony Stark to Hulk in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Mew-mew? What's mew-mew?
Reference: Darcy Lewis, trying to pronounce “Mjolnir” in Thor

Quote: Someone peed my pants! Not sure if it was the baby me or the old me. Or was it just me-me?
Reference: Ant-Man in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: It's good to meet you, Dr. Banner. Your work on anti-electron collisions is unparalleled. And I'm a huge fan of the way you lose control and turn into an enormous green rage monster.
Reference: Tony Stark in The Avengers

Quote: You call me 'young lady' again, I'll shove my foot up somewhere it's not supposed to be.
Reference: Maria Rambeau in Captain Marvel

Quote: Have you ever tried shawarma? There's a shawarma joint about two blocks from here.
Reference: Tony Stark in The Avengers

Quote: I choose to run toward my problems and not away from them. Because's that … because that's what heroes do.
Reference: Thor in Thor: Ragnarok

Quote: It's not enough to be against something. You have to be for something better.
Reference: Tony Stark in Captain America: Civil War

Quote: Victory at the expense of the innocent is no victory at all.
Reference: King T'Chaka in Captain America: Civil War

Quote: No man can win every battle, but no man should fall without a struggle.
Reference: Peter Parker in Spider-Man: Homecoming

Quote: Just because something works doesn't mean it can't be improved.
Reference: Shuri in Black Panther

Quote: If you're nothing without this suit, then you shouldn't have it.
Reference: Tony Stark to Peter Parker in Spider-Man: Homecoming

Quote: Everyone fails at who they're supposed to be, Thor. The measure of a person, of a hero, is how well they succeed at being who they are.
Reference: Frigga to her son Thor in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: I would rather be a good man than a great king.
Reference: Thor in Thor: The Dark World

Quote: I know you were only doing what you believe in, and that's all any of us can do. It's all any of us should.
Reference: Captain America in Captain America: Civil War

Quote: No amount of money ever bought a second of time.
Reference: Tony Stark in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: We never lose our demons, Mordo. We only learn to live above them.
Reference: The Ancient One in Doctor Strange

Quote: Today we don't fight for one life. We fight for all of them.
Reference: T'Challa in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: All we can do is our best, and sometimes the best that we can do is to start over.
Reference: Peggy Carter in Captain America: The First Avenger

Quote: In times of crisis, the wise build bridges, while the foolish build barriers. We must find a way to look after one another, as if we were one single tribe.
Reference: T'Challa in Black Panther

Quote: You hope for the best and make do with what you get.
Reference: Nick Fury in Avengers: Age of Ultron

Quote: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Reality is often disappointing. Now, reality can be whatever I want.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: You should have gone for the head.
Reference: Thanos to Thor in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: I am inevitable.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: You're not the only one cursed with knowledge.
Reference: Thanos to Tony Stark in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: You could not live with your own failure. Where did that bring you? Back to me.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: It's a simple calculus. This universe is finite, its resources finite. If life is left unchecked, life will cease to exist. It needs correcting.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: With all the six stones, I could simply snap my fingers, and they would all cease to exist. I call that mercy.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: No resurrections this time.
Reference: Thanos to Loki in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: I will shred this universe down to its last atom and then, with the stones you've collected for me, create a new one, teeming with life that knows not what it is lost but only what it is been given … a grateful universe.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: What I'm about to do to your stubborn, annoying, little planet… I'm gonna enjoy it very, very much.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: I ignored my destiny once. I cannot do that again. Not even for you. I'm sorry, little one.
Reference: Thanos to Gamora in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Destiny arrives all the same. And now it's here. Or should I say, I am.
Reference: Thanos in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: I'm just a kid from Brooklyn.
Reference: Captain America in Captain America: The First Avenger

Quote: You get hurt, hurt 'em back. You get killed, walk it off.
Reference: Captain America in Avengers: Age of Ultron

Quote: I'm gonna need a rain check on that dance.
Reference: Captain America to Peggy Carter in Captain America: The First Avenger

Quote: You know, for the longest time, I dreamed about coming overseas and being on the front lines. Serving my country. I finally get everything I wanted, and I'm wearing tights.
Reference: Captain America to Peggy Carter in Captain America: The First Avenger

Quote: This job… We try to save as many people as we can. Sometimes that doesn't mean everybody. But if we can't find a way to live with that, next time … maybe nobody gets saved.
Reference: Captain America to the rest of the Avengers in Captain America: Civil War

Quote: Well, things aren't so bad. Food's a lot better; we used to boil everything. No polio is good. Internet: so helpful. I've been reading that a lot, trying to catch up.
Reference: Captain America to Sam Wilson in Captain America: The Winter Soldier

Quote: When I went under, the world was at war. I wake up, they say we won. They didn't say what we lost.
Reference: Captain America in The Avengers

Quote: No mistakes. No do-overs. Look out for each other. This is the fight of our lives.
Reference: Captain America in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: You know, I keep telling everybody they should move on and grow. Some do. But not us.
Reference: Captain America in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: I can do this all day.
Reference: Captain America in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: I don't want to kill anyone. I don't like bullies. I don't care where they're from.
Reference: Captain America in Captain America: The First Avenger

Quote: There's only one God, ma'am. And I'm pretty sure he doesn't dress like that.
Reference: Captain America on Loki in The Avengers

Quote: I'm with you 'til the end of the line.
Reference: Captain America to Bucky Barnes in Captain America: The Winter Soldier

Quote: Don't do anything I would do, and definitely don't do anything I wouldn't do. There's a little gray area there, and that's where you operate.
Reference: Tony Stark in Spider-Man: Homecoming

Quote: If we can't accept limitations, then we're no better than the bad guys.
Reference: Tony Stark in Captain America: Civil War

Quote: You can take away my house, all my tricks and toys, but one thing you can't take away: I am Iron Man.
Reference: Tony Stark in Iron Man 3

Quote: It's not about how much we lost. It's about how much we have left.
Reference: Tony Stark in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: Iron Man. That's kind of catchy. It's got a nice ring to it. I mean, it's not technically accurate. The suit's a gold titanium alloy, but it's kind of provocative, the imagery anyway.
Reference: Tony Stark in Iron Man

Quote: I had my eyes opened. I came to realize that I had more to offer this world than just making things that blow up.
Reference: Tony Stark in Iron Man

Quote: I love you 3,000.
Reference: Tony Stark to his daughter, Morgan, in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: No hard feelings, Point Break. You've got a mean swing.
Reference: Tony Stark to Thor in The Avengers

Quote: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist.
Reference: Tony Stark describing himself in The Avengers

Quote: Part of the journey is the end.
Reference: Tony Stark in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: There's no throne. There is no version of this where you come out on top. Maybe your army comes, and maybe it's too much for us, but it's all on you. Because if we can't protect the Earth, you can be damned well sure we'll avenge it.
Reference: Tony Stark in The Avengers

Quote: The Avengers. That's what we call ourselves; we're sort of like a team. 'Earth's mightiest heroes'-type thing.
Reference: Tony Stark in The Avengers

Quote: I'm sorry, Earth is closed today. You better pack it up and get outta here.
Reference: Tony Stark in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Is it better to be feared or respected? I say, is it too much to ask for both?
Reference: Tony Stark in Iron Man

Quote: Are you seriously telling me that your plan to save the universe is based on Back to the Future?
Reference: Tony Stark in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: I went for the head.
Reference: Thor, after killing Thanos in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: This drink, I like it! Another!
Reference: Thor after trying coffee in Thor

Quote: You seek love. It's all any of us want.
Reference: Thor in Thor: Love and Thunder

Quote: I know him! He's a friend from work!
Reference: Thor, referring to Hulk, in Thor: Ragnarok

Quote: I make grave mistakes all the time. Everything seems to work out.
Reference: Thor in Thor: Ragnarok

Quote: Brother, how ever I have wronged you, whatever I have done that has led you to do this, I am truly sorry. But these people are innocent, taking their lives will gain you nothing. So take mine, and end this.
Reference: Thor to Loki in Thor

Quote: These hands were once used for battle, now they're but humble tools for peace.
Reference: Thor in Thor: Love and Thunder

Quote: There was one time when we were children. He transformed himself into a snake, and he knows that I love snakes. So I went to pick up the snake to admire it, and he transformed back into himself and he was like, 'Blech, it's me!' And he stabbed me. We were 8 at the time.
Reference: Thor on Loki in Thor: Ragnarok

Quote: You people are so petty. And tiny.
Reference: Thor to his fellow Avengers in The Avengers

Quote: Thank you, sweet rabbit.
Reference: Thor to Rocket Raccoon in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Oh, by the way, this is a friend of mine, the tree.
Reference: Thor, introducing Groot to Captain America in Avengers: Infinity War

Quote: Your ancestors called it magic, and you call it science. Well, I come from a place where they're one and the same thing.
Reference: Thor to scientist Jane Foster in Thor

Quote: I used to want to be a Valkyrie when I was younger, until I found out you were all women. There's nothing wrong with women, of course. I love women. Sometimes a little too much. Not in a creepy way, just more like a respectful appreciation.
Reference: Thor in Thor: Ragnarok

Quote: Avengers, assemble!
Reference: Captain America in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: I recognize that the council has made a decision, but given that it's a stupid-ass decision, I've elected to ignore it.
Reference: Nick Fury in The Avengers

Quote: I can't control their fear, only my own.
Reference: Wanda Maximoff in Captain America: Civil War

Quote: That's my secret, Captain. I'm always angry.
Reference: Bruce Banner in The Avengers

Quote: The city is flying. We're fighting an army of robots. And I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense.
Reference: Clint Barton in Avengers: Age of Ultron

Quote: Why don't you pick on someone your own size?
Reference: Ant-Man in Ant-Man

Quote: Puny god.
Reference: Hulk to Loki in The Avengers

Quote: At some point, we all have to choose between what the world wants you to be and who you are.
Reference: Natasha Romanoff (Black Widow) in Black Widow

Quote: You shouldn't have killed my mom and squished my Walkman.
Reference: Peter Quill in Guardians of the Galaxy, Vol. 2

Quote: If I tell you what happens, it won't happen.
Reference: Doctor Strange to Tony Stark in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: Tony, trying to get you to stop has been one of the few failures of my entire life.
Reference: Pepper Potts to Tony Stark in Avengers: Endgame

Quote: The truth is a matter of circumstances; it's not all things to all people all the time. And neither am I.
Reference: Natasha Romanoff in Captain America: The Winter Soldier

Quote: I am Loki of Asgard, and I am burdened with glorious purpose.
Reference: Loki in The Avengers

Quote: Thanks, but the last time I was in New York I kind of broke … Harlem.
Reference: Bruce Banner to Tony Stark in The Avengers

Quote: Just a typical homecoming, on the outside of an invisible jet, fighting my girlfriend's dad.
Reference: Peter Parker in Spider-Man: Homecoming
